items.name: Plain Cheese Pizza
items.description: Classic cheese pizza with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Topped with plenty of pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Vegan Garden Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with tomatoes, cucumbers, and vinaigrette.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
items.description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken breast and house dressing.

items.name: Buffalo Wings
items.description: Spicy buffalo wings served with celery and blue cheese dressing.

items.name: Meatball Parm Sandwich
items.description: Meatballs in marinara sauce topped with melted mozzarella on a hoagie roll.

items.name: Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce
items.description: Classic spaghetti pasta served with homemade marinara sauce.

items.name: Sausage Pizza
items.description: Pizza topped with Italian sausage and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Cheese Steak Sandwich
items.description: Thinly sliced steak with melted cheese and onions on a hoagie roll.

items.name: Garden Vegetable Pizza
items.description: Topped with fresh bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives.
